item.title: CVE-2024-49231|2024-10-18T09:52:21.551Z -- peter%20cyclop -- wordpress%20video
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Peter CyClop WordPress Video allows Stored XSS.This issue affects WordPress Video: from n/a through 1.0.
